greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Semiprimes in third spoke of a hexagonal spiral (A056107).
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: A056107(2) = 13 is not in the sequence, as it is a prime.
A056107(3) = 28 is not in the sequence, as it is a 3-almost prime.
xref: Semiprimes in other spokes: A113519, A113524, A113527, A113528, A113530.
results.author: _Jonathan Vos Post_, Jan 12 2006
